# star-search

start alliance award search

<p align="center">
  <img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="Kameleont" >
</p>

## Development

### Getting started

```sh
npm run setup
```

### Running in dev mode

```sh
APP={app} API_ENVIRONMENT={stage} npm run dev
```

This will add a symlink between ./shared and ./apps/\$appname/shared

### Running in Docker

#### Docker

```sh
docker build \
  --build-arg app={app} \
  --build-arg api_env stage \
  -t bbm-2018-app-{app} .
docker run -p 4711:4711 bbm-2018-app-{app}
```

#### Docker Compose

_NOTE: Add **127.0.0.1 papi.bbm** to your hosts file_

```sh
docker-compose build
docker-compose up
```

### Exporting static site

```sh
APP={app} API_ENVIRONMENT={env} EXPORT={channel} npm run export
```

### Set device

Setting cookie `channel` to `desktop`/`mobile` will render page accordingly

### Showing test ads

Set cookie `_ta_` to `image` to show test ads. More details available [here](https://github.com/BonnierNews/bonnier-ad-utils#61-ta-cookie).

## Linting

```sh
npm run lint:fix
```

or

```sh
npm run lint:code:fix
npm run lint:style:fix
```

### VS Code

Install plugins

_`Ctrl+P` then paste each line seperatly_

```
ext install esbenp.prettier-vscode
ext install dbaeumer.vscode-eslint
ext install shinnn.stylelint
```

Set some settings

```json
{
  ...,
  "prettier.eslintIntegration": true,
  "prettier.stylelintIntegration": true,
  "eslint.autoFixOnSave": true,
  "editor.formatOnSave": true,
  "[javascript]": {
      "editor.formatOnSave": false
  }
}
```

Then restart code
